SEARCH
Package de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controller

Klasse OrganizationController

java.lang.Object
de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controller.OrganizationController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/api/organizations") public class OrganizationController extends Object
This Class is the Controller for the REST-API path "/api/organizations". It provides an interface regarding organizations.
Autor:
Lukas Burkhardt

  • Konstruktordetails

    • OrganizationController

      public OrganizationController(OrganizationControllerService organizationControllerService, org.modelmapper.ModelMapper mapper)

  • Methodendetails

    • createEvent

      @PostMapping("/{organizationId}/create-event") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createEvent(@PathVariable String organizationId, @RequestBody Event event, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Creates an event in the specified organization with the specified account with the role organizer. Allows access only for admins and organizers of the specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to create the event in
      event - the event to be created
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the event as an object and the http status code

    • getOrganizations

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getOrganizations(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Returns a list of the organizations existing in the database.
      Parameter:
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with a list of organizations and the http status code

    • getOrganization

      @GetMapping("/{organizationId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getOrganization(@PathVariable String organizationId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Returns a single organization with the given id. Allows only access to members and above of the specified organization
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to be returned
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the organization object and the http status code

    • getEvents

      @GetMapping("/{organizationId}/events") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getEvents(@PathVariable String organizationId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Returns a list of events from a single organization specified by an id. Allows only access to members and above of the specified organization
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to get the events from
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      List list of events

    • getAccounts

      @GetMapping("/{organizationId}/accounts") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAccounts(@PathVariable String organizationId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Returns a list of account information objects from the accounts of an organization specified by its id. Allows only access to organizer and above of the specified organizationAllows
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to get the account information from.
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      List list of account information

    • createOrganisation

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createOrganisation(@RequestBody Organization organisation, @RequestParam @NotNull @NotNull String email)
      Creates a new organization out of the given organization object, not all values have to be set.
      Parameter:
      organisation - the organization to be created
      email - an email address to which an invitation to become the first admin is sent
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the organization object and the http status code

    • editOrganisation

      @PostMapping("/{organizationId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity editOrganisation(@PathVariable String organizationId, @RequestBody Organization organisation, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Overwrites an existing organization object with the given organization object. Allows only access to admins of the specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to be overwritten
      organisation - the organization object with the new organization information
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the new organization object and the http status code

    • sendInvitation

      @PostMapping("/{organizationId}/invite") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> sendInvitation(@PathVariable String organizationId, @RequestParam String email, @RequestParam OrganizationRole role, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Sends an invitation link in a mail to a specified organization. Allows only access to admins of the specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to send an invitation link to
      email - the email to send the invitation to
      role - the role to set the account with the invitation to
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the http status code and optional an error code

    • acceptInvitation

      @PostMapping("/{organizationId}/add-account") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity acceptInvitation(@PathVariable String organizationId, @RequestParam String token, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Adds an account to an organization after the account owner accepted an invitation. Allows access for all users with a valid barer token.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to add the account to
      token - the token to verify the invitation
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the http status code

    • removeAccount

      @PostMapping("/{organizationId}/remove-account/{accountId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity removeAccount(@PathVariable String organizationId, @PathVariable String accountId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Removes a specified account from a specified organization. Allows only access to admin of the specified organization
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to remove the account from
      accountId - the id of the account to be removed
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the http status code

    • changeRole

      @PostMapping("/{organizationId}/change-role/{accountId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity changeRole(@PathVariable String organizationId, @PathVariable String accountId, @RequestParam OrganizationRole fromRole, @RequestParam OrganizationRole toRole, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Changes the role of a specified account in a specified organization. Allows access only to admins of the specified organization
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization where to change the accounts role
      accountId - the id of the account which role has to be changed
      fromRole - the role of the account before the change
      toRole - the role to change the account to
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the http status code

    • leaveOrganization

      @PostMapping("/{organizationId}/leave-organization/{accountId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity leaveOrganization(@PathVariable String organizationId, @PathVariable String accountId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      A specified account leaves a specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to remove the account from
      accountId - the id of the account to be removed
      Gibt zurück:
      ReponseEntity with the http status code
